qa_pairs.question: If I am standing by the heater and facing the bedstool, is the standing lamp to my front-left, front-right, back-left, or back-right? The directions refer to the quadrants of a Cartesian plane (if I am standing at the origin and facing along the positive y-axis).['A. back-right', 'B. front-left', 'C. back-left', 'D. front-right']
